songs.title: Everything
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, yeah
What you need? Everything
What you want? Everything
Oh my god, Ronny

[Chorus]
Everything, everything, everything, yeah
Everything, everything, everything, yeah
I want it all, what, I need it all
Yeah, I want it all, yeah, I need it all
I'm talkin' everything, yeah, everything
Everything, yeah, everything
I want it all, yeah, I need it all, yeah
I want it all, yeah, I need it all

[Verse 1]
I'm ballin', back again with the
With that bag of work, I'm tryna motherfuckin' sell it
'Cause what, what? I need a lot, yeah
I been in the kitchen stirin' pots, shit
I'm servin' on the fuckin' haft in my Impala
Told that bitch she can come in holla
'Cause I'm all about my dollars and I need every penny
Bitch, don't play me, yeah

[Chorus]
'Cause I want everything, everything, everything
What I need, everything, everything, everything
I want it all, I need it all
I want it all, yeah, I need it all
Everything, everything, everything, yeah
Everything, everything, everything, yeah
I want it all, I need it all
I want it all, yeah

[Verse 2]
Back in the day, back in the day
But I wasn't some robbers
They used to go on so many houses, you would think they were coppers
They was at the front door, knockin' "hello, let us in"
What that is? A flat-screen tv? Then we need it with the Benz
They like "everything, everything, everything"
"Who you are?"
I'm like goddamn, take that shit down to the car—
Shop, make some cash nigga
And come and see me 'cause I got the fuckin' work
I know y'all niggas tryna be me 'cause I want

[Chorus]
Everything, everything, everything
Yeah, I need everything, everything, everything
What you say? I want it all, I need it all
I want it all, yeah, I need it all

[Outro]
Everything, everything, everything
Everything, everything, everything
I want it all, I need it all
I want it all
